game.name: Disney Princesses Christmas Dinner
game.description:
Christmas is just around the corner and the two frozen sisters Anna and Elsa have made a plan to invite their best friends Ariel and Moan at the dinner of this lovely evening. Oh! But these Disney princesses have lots of things to do and look pretty confused what to do to manage all the arrangements of the celebration perfectly. Do you like to help them out? Join Disney Princesses Christmas Dinner game and be prepared to help them welcome their guests wholeheartedly! 

Your first job in this brand new dressing game for girls is to help princesses to pick up the perfect outfits for the dinner party. And, then you have to help them to decorate the room with the available Christmas items. Firstly, give your princess Anna a red color short dress with white color fur on its border and combine it with a lovely hairstyle, a matching red color crown to her head and a pair of red sandals. Prepare the rest three princesses by mixing and matching as many dress and accessory options as you can in this html5 dress up game!

In the second stage, you have to decorate their room with the food and decorating items. Give their room a suitable chair and table, and fill it up with the needful drink and other eatable items! Change the table cloth, background wall design and images hanging on the wall in this one of the best decoration games for girls! Once you are done, click the right click button and get ready to see the final result. Check out more princess dress-up games for kids online, no download required on atmegame.com!
